member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_CREDENTIALS_TYPE
member.summary: The EC_SUBSCRIPTION_CREDENTIALS_TYPE enumeration specifies the type of credentials to use when communicating with event sources.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_CREDENTIALS_TYPE.EcSubscriptionCredDefault
member.summary: Negotiate with event sources to specify a proper authentication type without specifying a username and password for the subscription credentials.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_CREDENTIALS_TYPE.EcSubscriptionCredNegotiate
member.summary: WinRM will negotiate with event sources to specify a proper authentication type for the subscription credentials.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_CREDENTIALS_TYPE.EcSubscriptionCredDigest
member.summary: Use digest authentication for the subscription credentials.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_CREDENTIALS_TYPE.EcSubscriptionCredBasic
member.summary: Send a username and password to use as credentials for the subscription.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_CREDENTIALS_TYPE.EcSubscriptionCredLocalMachine
member.summary: Use the local computer's domain account credentials to create a subscription instead of using user credentials for the subscription. This has the advantage of not having to manage user accounts and password expiration to simplify long lasting subscription management.
